pkgmetadata.longdescription: a growing collection of weather radar algorithms and utilities build on top ofthe Scientific Python stack and distributed under the 3-Clause BSD license.Py-ART is used by the Atmospheric Radiation Measurement (ARM) Climate ResearchFacility for working with data from a number of precipitation and cloud radars,but has been designed so that it can be used by others in the radar andatmospheric communities to examine, processes, and analyse data from many typesof weather radars.
